title: Welcome!
text:
This is the personal website for Jim Kloet (Kloet rhymes with flute).
Thanks for visiting! You can find my resume, blog, links to social, and other projects using the navbar at the top.

title: Resume & CV
text:
Resume
View and download my latest resume on github.


Talks
Here’s where I’ll link to RStudio::conf, and whatever talks I gave on the 311 dashboard.


Peer-Reviewed Publications & Presentations
Here’s where I’ll link to a handful of papers from my time in academic settings

title: Resume
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: Blog
text:
This is where stuff I’ve written lives. I don’t know that I can call this a blog anymore - do people even still say blog? - given my infrequent posting habits, but we’ll see if that changes.











Test Post












May 29, 2023


Jim Kloet
